metadata.title: CVE-2017-11698 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the __get_page function inlib/dbm/src/h_page.c in Mozilla Network Security Services (NSS) allowscontext-dependent attackers to have unspecified impact using a craftedcert8.db file.

criterions.comment: nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
